metadata.title: CVE-2018-6799 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The AcquireCacheNexus function in magick/pixel_cache.c in GraphicsMagickbefore 1.3.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heapoverwrite) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted imagefile, because a pixel staging area is not used.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.28-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.28-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.28-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.28-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.28-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.28-1').
